org.fishwife.jrugged

Class FlowMeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fishwife.jrugged.FlowMeter

  • public class FlowMeter
extends Object
    This class uses a raw RequestCounter to compute request rates over time for total rate of request, rate of successful requests, and rate of failed requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlowMeter(RequestCounter counter)
      Constructs a FlowMeter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] sample()
      Takes a sample of the request rates.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlowMeter

        public FlowMeter(RequestCounter counter)
        Constructs a FlowMeter.
        Parameters:
        counter - the RequestCounter to calculate request rates from

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        public double[] sample()
        Takes a sample of the request rates. Calculations are based on differences in request counts since the last call to sample().
        Returns:
        an array of three doubles: total requests per second, successful requests per second, failed requests per second. If this is the first sample, all three rates will be reported as zero requests per second.
